type.description:
## Prevent Movement Checks

---


[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/prevent_movement_checks).

Prevents the game from checking for if the power holder has "moved wrongly".

Type ID: `apugli:prevent_movement_checks`

---

### Example
```json
{
    "type": "apugli:prevent_movement_checks"
}
```

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Prevent Movement Checks (Power Type) date: 2023-11-11

Prevent Movement Checks

Power Type.

Prevents the game from checking for if the power holder has "moved wrongly".

Type ID: apugli:prevent_movement_checks

Fields

None.

Example

{
    "type": "apugli:prevent_movement_checks"
}
